column1: The Pit Room////Good BBQ in the city is hard find
column2: let alone one that is open past 6. The Pit is able to accomplish both feats. As far at the food goes the brisket was moist and tender
column3: the jalape√±o sausage actually had some spice and good flavor and the pulled pork was flavorful. The one down side was that the ribs were a bit dry which was disappointing but considering the rest of the food will defiantly be back
